text: ninnalute bharyamaril ninn vallavarum avisvasikalute kuttattilekk (peayitt ninnalkkâ€Œ) nastappetukayum ennitt ninnal anantara natapatiyetukkukayum ceyyukayanenkil arute bharyamaranea nastappett peayatâ€Œ, avarkk avar celavalicca tuka (mahr) pealullat ninnal nalkuka. etearu allahuvil ninnal visvasikkunnuvea avane ninnal suksikkukayum ceyyuka
